title: Firefox can't download files
content: Every week or so firefox becomes incapable of downloading any files regardless of site, size, or filetype. Running in troubleshoot mode and deleting all plugins does not solve issue, only solution is to refresh/reset firefox, which solves the issue until it starts up again, I haven't found any catalyst except for downloading, but that might just be when I notice it.
creator: jaydenrobertson

title: selecting bookmark ,then another,first one doesn't dropoff
content: please explain to me settings or fixes for above described
creator: jkolesar1

title: Firefox does not connect to web
content: I uninstalled Mozilla VPN after poor performance. Now Firefox will not connect to the web although other browsers work (Edge). A new tab page loads but without any news, etc. I have uninstalled Firefox and reloaded it several times without effect.
creator: rv8pilot

title: If you can NOT stop the install of devlools I wil NEVER use your browser again
content:
If you can NOT stop the install of DevTools I will NEVER use your browser again. It is driving crazy WHY? I can remove it but it come back next time I open the browser. I have tried every thing online to remove it but noting removes it. Can you help me, PLEASE. HELP, I need HELP. Dennis Lindsay ... ...

creator: dlindsay1

title: Double Windows When Launching Default Browser from External Link, Monterey Beta
content:
Allo!

MacOS Monterey Beta V12, most current beta as of the date of this posting. (Firefox 2.0.1 (64-bit)

Issue: say from Alfred or my 3rd party mail client, or any other application, native or otherwise, clicking a web link launches my default browser (FF), HOWEVER I am hit with the seemingly unsolvable double window bug.

One window opens my home page, along with a second window headed to the link target. I've looked at about:config neww settings, all default. My preferences are set to force open new windows in tabs. Just to be clear, this behavior ONLY occurs when Firefox is not already running.

Any insight?

Not the end of the world but certainly not ideal nor graceful. Otherwise, keep up the amazing work Mozilla, you have breathed new life into the Firefox world and I. Am. Here. For. it. Thanks!
creator: hungrywolfinc

title: Just last 2 weeks Firefox can't open my email inbox. It asks for me to login and when I give my info it shows a spinning wheel that continues spinning until it says "timeout'
content: What has happened to my Firefox that it won't open my email anymore? How do I fix it? I now have to use MS Edge to read my email.
creator: cepecity

title: Settings and extentions
content: Firefox just did a major update and changed EVERYTHING. Gee thanks I liked it the way it was. How do I get all of my settings and extensions back to normal?
